description: This file defines a React component named DeviceForm used for creating new device entries by submitting a form that posts data to a backend API endpoint. It manages form state, handles submission, success/error messaging, and notifies parent components upon successful addition.

methods.name: DeviceForm
methods.description: React functional component for device creation form, managing state and handling form submission.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Asynchronous function handling form submission, API call, form reset, success/error handling, and callbacks.
